startup_analysis.title: AI-Powered Personal Stylist App
startup_analysis.description: An app that curates outfits based on users' existing wardrobes, weather, and calendar events using AI technology.
startup_analysis.problem: Users struggle with finding the right outfits based on their wardrobe, weather, and schedule.
startup_analysis.solution: An AI-powered app that analyzes users' wardrobes, weather conditions, and calendar events to suggest outfits.
startup_analysis.monetization: Primary revenue from premium subscription tiers offering advanced features and expert stylist consultations
startup_analysis.differentiator: Real-time, AI-driven outfit suggestions tailored to individual users' wardrobe inventory, hyper-localized trend analysis, personal style evolution, and a style sustainability score
risks: Accurately identifying and suggesting outfits for diverse body types, styles, and trends
startup_analysis.vision: To become a leading AI-powered personal stylist app for fashion-conscious individuals globally, promoting inclusivity, ethical business practices, and cutting-edge technology

details.Description: Developer of an avatar fashion application intended to enhance apparel e-commerce discovery and experience. The company offers playable styling that empowers the consumer to unlock the stylist in them by mixing, matching, and customizing apparel, it merges playable styling and immersive storytelling with social AR stories, enabling virtual influencers with avatars and co-create branded content with the apparel brands.
details.Where is YOLOgram headquartered?: YOLOgram is headquartered in New Delhi, India.
